control.name: checkEdit1
control.description: Enables or disables the view's AllowChangeColumnParent option which specifies whether end users can move columns between bands.

control.name: checkEdit2
control.description: Enables or disables the view's AllowChangeBandParent option which specifies whether end users can reorder bands.

control.name: checkEdit3
control.description: Enables or disables the view's ShowBandsInCustomizationForm option which specifies whether the headers of hidden bands can be displayed within the customization form.

control.name: simpleButton1
control.description: Shows the Customization Form if it was previously hidden or hides the form if it's currently displayed. The customization form provides facilities for adding and removing columns and bands from a view at runtime using drag and drop.
